update daphnia_acute
cas_no = #{casNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
smiles = #{smiles,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

update daphnia_acute
smiles = #{smiles,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
nCrq = #{ncrq,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
F04NS = #{f04ns,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
Bo4OO = #{bo4oo,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
F08OO = #{f08oo,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
Eig08_AEAbo = #{eig08Aeabo,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
B02NCl = #{b02ncl,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
EC50_48h = #{ec5048h,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
exp_value = #{expValue,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
pre_value = #{preValue,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where cas_no = #{casNo} and datatype = #{datatype}

update daphnia_acute set cas_no = #{casNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, smiles = #{smiles,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, nCrq = #{ncrq,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, F04NS = #{f04ns,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, Bo4OO = #{bo4oo,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, F08OO = #{f08oo,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, Eig08_AEAbo = #{eig08Aeabo,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, B02NCl = #{b02ncl,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, EC50_48h = #{ec5048h,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, exp_value = #{expValue,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, pre_value = #{preValue,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, datatype = #{datatype,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select sum(if(exp_value=1 and pre_value=1 ,1,0)) as TP, sum(if(exp_value=0 and pre_value=0 ,1,0)) as TN, sum(if(exp_value=1 and pre_value=0 ,1,0)) as FN, sum(if(exp_value=0 and pre_value=1 ,1,0)) as FP, sum(if(datatype=#{dataType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},1,0)) as nums from (select from daphnia_acute where datatype=#{dataType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) as newtable
